io.openhc.ohc.basestation

Class Basestation

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openhc.ohc.basestation.Basestation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rpc_group.Rpc_group_callback

    public class Basestation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rpc_group.Rpc_group_callback
    OOP representation of the Basestation (Gateway, OHC-Node) This class implements all high-level RPCs. It also holds a dedicated network handler allowing for the coexistence of multiple basestation instances
    Author:
    Tobias Schramm
